## Accept if all are true
- Scope is bounded and atomic.
- Acceptance Criteria and Definition of Done are explicit.
- Verification method exists.
- No policy or safety conflict.

## Reject if any are true
- Missing Acceptance Criteria, Definition of Done, or verification plan.
- Multi-scope task that cannot be delegated atomically.
- Unsafe action without explicit approval path.
- Duplicate of an active task.
